org.ntnu.utility
Class Config

java.lang.Object
  org.ntnu.utility.Config

 class Config
extends java.lang.Object

This class serves as a global configuration module for the whole application. Variables are public and static so they can be reused by all classes. The class also contains methods for handling the .ini configuration file on the filesystem.

Author:
Martin Matusiak
